title: Gilbert and Sullivan's Cox and Box: or the long lost brothers
brief_description: Gilbert and Sullivan’s well known operetta “Cox and Box.” Performers include: John Fryatt, Russell Smythe, Tom Lawlor. The London Symphony Orchestra (London) conducted by Alexander Faris. Staged by David Alden. Introduced by Douglas Fairbanks Jnr.
